name: Barbed Vine
description: A player afflicted with this token receives 1 dmg for each Roll Attempt beyond the first during their Offensive Roll Phase, up to a maximum of 2 dmg per turn. This token is removed and then this dmg is applied at the conclusion of the Roll Phase.
shortDescription: Receive 1 dmg for additional Roll Attempts

name: Bleed
description: A player afflicted with this token must roll 1 die during their Upkeep Phase. On 1-4, they are dealt 1 dmg. On 5-6, remove this token.
shortDescription: Roll 1 die in Upkeep Phase. On 1-4, receive 1 dmg, otherwise, remove token

name: Blind
description: The next time a player afflicted with this token concludes their Offensive Roll Phase, they must remove it and roll 1 die. On 1-2, their Offensive Roll Phase fails and has no effect of any kind.

name: Blinding Light
description:
The next time a player afflicted with this token concludes their Offensive Roll Phase, they must remove this token and roll 1 die:
On 1, their Offensive Roll Phase has no effect of any kind.
On 2-3, any dmg they deal for the remainder of the Roll Phase is reduced by 1/2 (rounded up).
shortDescription: Roll 1 die to fail or reduce Attack dmg

name: Bounty
description: When a player afflicted with this token is Attacked by an opponent, the attacker increases their dmg by 1 and gains 1 CP. Persistent.

name: Burn
description: A player afflicted with this token receives 2 dmg during their Upkeep Phase. Persistent.

name: Concussion
description: A player afflicted with this token must skip their Income Phase and then remove this token.

name: Constrict
description: A player afflicted with this token gets 1 fewer roll attempts during their next Offensive Roll Phase. This roll attempt may be reacquired at any time for 1 CP. At the conclusion of the Roll Phase, remove this token.
shortDescription: Spend CP or lose one roll attempt

name: Crimson Bands
description: A player afflicted with this token cannot play cards during their next Roll Phase. Then, at the conclusion of the Roll Phase, discard this token.
shortDescription: Cannot play cards during next Roll Phase

name: Delayed Poison
description: A player afflicted with this token removes it at the conclusion of their turn and then receives 3 dmg.
shortDescription: Receive 2 dmg at the end of your turn

name: Entangle
description: A player afflicted with this token gets 1 fewer Roll Attempts during their next Offensive Roll Phase. At the conclusion of the Roll Phase, remove this token

name: Knockdown
description: To remove this token, a player afflicted with it must spend 2CP before the start of their Offensive Roll Phase. If the player does not, they must skip their Offensive Roll Phase and then remove this token.
shortDescription: Spend 2CP or skip Offensive Roll Phase

name: Nanite
description:
When Detonated, remove all tokens and deal dmg based on the number of Nanites on each player:
1 Nanite: receive 1 dmg.
2 Nanites: receive 3 dmg.
3 Nanites: receive 5 dmg.
During Upkeep Phase, a player rolls 1 die per Nanite they are afflicted with: on 6, remove this token.
shortDescription: Deals dmg based on number of Nanites

name: Parasite
description: During their Upkeep Phase, if a player inflicted with this token has a Positive Status Effect, they receive 1 dmg. Additionally, if they spend a Positive Status Effect to successfully prevent or avoid dmg, remove Parasite and they receive 3 as an isolated source of undefendable dmg.

name: Parlay
description: A player afflicted with Parlay may not deal any damage as a result of their Offensive Roll Phase (although other effects may still apply). A the conclusion of the Roll Phase, remove this token.

name: Poison
description: A player afflicted with this token is dealt 1 dmg per Poison token during the Upkeep Phase of their turn. Persistent.

name: Powder Keg
description: A player afflicted with this token must roll 1 die dureing their Upkeep Phase. On 1-2, the Keg blows up. On 3-5, nothing happens. On 6, the player afflicted with Powder Keg may transfer the token to a chosen player. Additionally, if a player becomes inflicted with Powder Keg while already inflicted with Powder Keg, the first Keg immediately blows up. When a Keg blows up, remove it and deal 3 as an isolated source of undefendable dmg.
shortDescription: Roll 1 die in Upkeep Phase. On 1-2, receive 3 dmg, on 6 pass it to anyone

name: Reality Warp
description: If a player is inflicted with this token when they begin their Offensive Roll Phase, they must remove it and use one of Scarlet Witch's dice in place of one of their own until the end of the Offensive Roll Phase.
shortDescription: Force your opponent to use one of your dice

name: Shame
description: When a player afflicted by SHame would deal dmg as a result of their Offensive Roll Phase, remove this token and reduce that dmg by 1. Attack Modifier.

name: Stun
description: A player afflicted with this token may take no actions of any kind (i.e. no cards may be played, no defense may be made, no status tokens or passive abilities may be used, etc). After the Attack concludes, the player who inflicted Stun removes the token and then immediately targets the same opponent with an additional Offensive Roll Phase (if this oppont is removed from the battlefield, this additional Offensive Roll Phase is forfeited).

name: Targeted
description: When a player afflicted with this token is Attacked by an opponent, the Incoming Attack dmg is increased by 2. Persistent.

name: Time Bomb
description:
When inflicting this token, if you have at least 6 Ability Upgrades in play, place it on the 0:01 side up. Otherwise place it on the 0:02 side up.

During their Upkeep Phase, a player afflicted with this token must roll 1 die: 
On 1-5, advance the Time Bomb.
On 6, remove the token.

When a Time Bomb is advanced:
If the token is on the 0:02 side, flip it to the 0:01 side.
If the token is on the 0:01 side, the player afflicted with this token removes it and receives 4 dmg as an isolated source of undefendable dmg.
shortDescription: Roll a 6 to attempt to defuse. Take 4 dmg if you run out of time

name: Webbed
description:
This token has no effect the turn it is inflicted or transferred.
On subsequent turns, when a player afflicted with this token is Attacked with normal damage, the damage type becomes undefendable instead and this token is immediately removed.

name: Wither
description: If a player with a Wither token would deal damage as a result of their Offensive Roll Phase, reduce that dmg by 1 per Wither token. Persistent.
